title: Honkers And Shouters: The Golden Years Of Rhythm & Blues
description: [From front flap] What did rhythm and blues have that gave it its impact and appeal? Who were the people who made it happen - the artists, producers, and audience - black and white alike - who dug its earthy realism and driving, dynamic sound? Here, for the first time, is the spectacular, foot-tapping, hand-clapping story...
author: Arnold Shaw
